subject: Re: Delivery fee increase on the quote platform

full_threads.body:
Thank you

Kind Regards,

David McLean

General Manager

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611 | M 0410 567 287

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi David,

Confirming we have updated the live site. The updated "Automatic transport fee" will be applied to quote created 2022-03-24 onwards.

Hi David,

Yes, the automatically generated transport amount cannot be change (unless we do it manually). You can use the Transport discount to manipulate the amount be deducted to the total. 
We will push this to live later after working hrs. I'll let you know when it is done.

Hi Joel, I just need to check one thing. The example you sent for a job where the initial rental was over $4500, had a $100 delivery fee reduction on it. I am assuming that you were showing me that we can alter the delivery fee by $100 if we need to, rather than the $100 reduction being automatically generated ??

To be safe, I tested it on the staging site by creating a quote under $4500 (initial rental) and one over $4500. Both worked perfectly in generating the correct transport amount. So it looks perfect. Thanks for doing this.

Good to go live.

David McLean

GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 |davidm@advantagestyling.com.au.au

029310 1611|Tenancy1, Unit1, 14ABaker Street BanksmeadowNSW 2019

http://advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi David,

No, the delivery fee increase has not been uploaded on the live site. We are waiting for your approval to push this to live.

Hi Joel, Can I check if this has been now uploaded onto the live site?

David McLean

Good to go live.

Thanks

David McLean

David McLean

Hi David/Dan,

We have updated the staging site. Please see below: 
https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/

On staging the "Calculated Transport Amount" only applies on quotes created after 2022-03-13. Quotes created after 2022-03-13 will have a note instead of a transport amount field. 
(Note: Transport amount is now automatically generated.)

Quotes created after 2022-03-13
- https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/proposal/?prop=b1BkYkIwMVJwVEJJdkhPNUtlMFhYdz09#content-summary
Quotes created before 2022-03-12. 
- https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/proposal/?prop=R3hBSDJDbjBGaENVMjUvQVhWTzRHZz09#content-summary

Calculated Transport Amount
If Initial rental is under 4500 the Transport amount is 790 
If Initial rental is above 4500 the Transport amount is 890

Let me know if this works for you?

That works for me

Thanks Heath

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and Joel,
Can we please change the delivery fees so that we have a delivery fee generated by the value of the styling rental (excl of GST and delivery fees) as follows:


$790 if proposal is under $4500 - so no change to current delivery fee
$890 if proposal is above $4500 - extra $100


Several of the Senior Stylists have templates for their quotes. Can you adjust those too, or do they need to do it manually themselves?


Existing quotes would be exempt. It would only be for new quotes.


thank you


David McLean

GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 |davidm@advantagestyling.com.au

029310 1611|Tenancy1, Unit1, 14ABaker Street BanksmeadowNSW 2019

advantagestyling.com.au
